pages.text: $(bgreen)Tall Nut$() is opening a chain of stores for Tall and Taller gentlemen. he'll shell out the savings to you !$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)125$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)defender$() plant that has high health, and it can $(bred)attract enemies in 7 * 7 range to attack itself$().

$(bpurple)Special :$() It can $(bred)block$() $(l)pole zombie, pogo zombie, dolphin rider$() to stop them.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will gain a large amount of $(l)defence life$() to protecte itself.
